description.en: These have certain terms, such as a certain quantity has to be purchased or if the customer is past a certain age
Offer to customers with a disability
Issuing cards that give certain customers or any customer a discount
Usually given to students, but may go to educators
Offered to members of the military and family members
When a seller needs cash flow, he may offer a partial discount
Some retailers give customers a lower price if they pay with cash. This saves the fee the retailer pays on credit cards
The wholesaler or manufacturer gives a discount to the retailer at the list price or catalogue price. This sometimes applies to promotions
A refund mailed to the purchaser after a purchase
This discount is calculated on a person's ability to pay. This is common with non-profit organizations
Usually this is given during a slack period when sales are down
This covers free or discounted prices for children under a certain age. There is usually a requirement that an adult pay full price
Payments for functions such as shelf stocking, warehousing or shipping
A discount for something that is returned
